bike.description: Alpha Red Aluminum w/semi-integrated E2 tapered head tube, shaped, formed & gusseted down tube, flared seat tube, hollow forged chainstay yoke, ISCG05 mounts, seatstay gusset, sliding dropouts w/stainless steel hardware & 135x10mm thru axle

components.description: Bontrager Cousin Earl Disc wheel system, 32 hole, 20mm front hub, 135x10mm rear hub, tubeless ready
Bontrager Rhythm Pro, 31.8mm, 50mm rise, 9 degree sweep
FSA NO.57E, E2, ACB sealed bearings
Bontrager QR seat collar, Trek 135x10mm alloy thru axle
